lead_paragraph: SCHRIJEN--Dr. Francine. On Friday, February 5, 2016 Dr. Francine Schrijen, Member of the Johns Hopkins University Society of Scholars, age 83 of Baltimore, MD. Beloved wife of Dr. Walter Ehrlich; devoted stepmother of Eva, Karel and Sonia Ehrlich; proud step-grandmother of seven and step-great-grandmother of four. She also leaves behind two sisters in France, Jacqueline Combettes and Marie Christine Boch Schrijen. Services and Interment private. In lieu of flowers, please remember Dr. Francine with memorial contributions to the One Million Community Health Workers Campaign: (http://1millionhealthworkers .org). Online condolences may be sent to the family through: peacefulalternatives.com. 1/3
